scripts.postpush: while true; do git push origin master && { echo 'Git push succeeded'; break; } || echo 'Git push failed, retrying in 1 seconds'; sleep 1; done
scripts.pull: while true; do git pull origin master && { echo 'Git pull succeeded'; break; } || echo 'Git pull failed, retrying in 1 seconds'; sleep 1; done
scripts.replace: find .  -type d \( -name .git -o -name node_modules \) -prune -o  -type f  -exec  sed -i s/validator/field/g {} \;
